articles.title: Federico Delbonis Wishes an Andy Murray Like Comeback for Fellow Countryman Juan Martin Del Potro
articles.description: Federico Delbonis hopes Juan Martin Del Potro to make a comeback like Murray. Delbonis will face Del Potro in the first round of the Argentina Open.
articles.content:

articles.description: The Foreign Secretary tweeted that “China must respect the Falklands’ sovereignty” after Argentinian president, Alberto Fernandez, met with China’s President Xi on the fringes of the Beijing winter Olympics.

articles.title: Liz Truss says Falklands are part of 'British family', as China backs Argentina's claim over islands after meeting during Beijing Olympics
articles.description: China's president Xi meets with Alberto Fernandez, the president of Argentina, in Beijing, and they agree on an accord in which China reasserts its support for Argentina's claim to the Falklands, while Mr Fernandez backs Mr Jingping's one-China policy, which claims Taiwan as its own.
articles.content:
The Falklands are "part of the British family", according to Liz Truss, after China backed Argentina's claims over the south Atlantic islands.
The foreign secretary wrote on Twitter that "China must respect Falklands' sovereignty" after Argentina's P... [5143 chars]

articles.title: UK rebukes China for supporting Argentina’s Falklands claim
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — Britain on Monday firmly rejected a statement from China that affirmed Beijing’s support for Argentina’s claim to the Falkland Islands,...
articles.content:
BEIJING (AP) — Britain on Monday firmly rejected a statement from China that affirmed Beijing’s support for Argentina’s claim to the Falkland Islands, as relations between London and Asia’s leading power remain strained.

articles.title: 'What A Monster': Fans React to Resurgent Juan Martin Del Potro at Practice Ahead of Possible Farewell Match
articles.description: Fans react emotionally and in amazement after watching Juan Martin Del Potro showcase vintage form in practice ahead of the Argentina Open.
articles.content:
Published 02/07/2022, 12:47 AM EST
33-year-old Juan Martin del Potro is finally about to make his return to the tennis circuit. The 2009 US Open champion will finally be playing again for the first time since 2019.

articles.title: China, Argentina pledge closer ties on currency, ‘Belt and Road’
articles.description: China is a major buyer of Argentine soybeans and beef. It also has a major currency swap deal with the country, which helps to bolster its dwindling foreign reserves. Fernandez is battling to revive the economy of Argentina, a major grains producer.
